title: Tirupur’s Saravana upbeat with two Ricoh buys - printweek
summary: Saravana Graphics, a printing and packaging specialist in India, recently invested in two Ricoh digital presses – a Ricoh Pro 8320S and a Ricoh Pro 7200X. These presses allow the company to print high-quality tags for garments, as well as other commercial printing projects. Saravana Graphics' investment in these advanced digital presses represents a significant business innovation, enabling them to expand their capabilities and explore new markets.
product_or_process: Ricoh Pro 8320S and Ricoh Pro 7200X digital presses
